metadata.name: uppercase

parameters.name: column_id
parameters.description: The column on which apply this action to
parameters.label: Column

parameters.name: row_id
parameters.description: The row on which apply this action to
parameters.label: Row

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The transformation scope (CELL | LINE | COLUMN | TABLE)
parameters.label: Scope

metadata.description: Converts all of the cell values in this column to upper case
metadata.label: Change case to UPPER
